articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to May 9 Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to May 9 Catfish Farm
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of  the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the May 9 Catfish Farm.
					 He said that he was very pleased to hear from the commanding officers of the unit of the People's Army he had inspected the day before that the unit had regularly been supplied with catfish produced by the farm according to the supply system established by leader Kim Jong Il and service personnel liked them very much, adding he visited the farm to meet the employees thoroughly carrying out the behest of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il personally initiated catfish farming, chose the site for the farm and clearly indicated tasks and ways for securing fries and putting fish culture on a scientific and intensive basis, Kim Jong Un said the farm serves as a breeding farm for the country's catfish culture and a patriotic legacy left by Kim Jong Il, which was built in the period of the Arduous March, forced march under his guidance and care.
					
					 Proposing erecting a monument to the field guidance to convey the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il to posterity as he visited the farm several times, Kim Jong Un personally chose its site and suggested officials to call the farm the May 9 Catfish Farm in the meaning that its employees should work hard, always remembering the day Kim Jong Il visited it for the first time.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round various places of the farm including the incubation pond and the catfish pond to learn in detail about the production and management on the farm.
					
					 Underscoring the need for the farm to increase the production of catfish more than 100 tons from next year with the existing manpower and production, he indicated the ways to do so.
					
					 The experience gained by the farm shows that it is possible to make a great success in fish farming only when it is put on a Juche, scientific and intensive basis, he said.
					
					 He called for raising a strong wind of bringing about a radical turn in fish farming on the basis of the experience and thus unconditionally and thoroughly carrying out the behest of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He praised the officials and employees of the May 9 Catfish Farm as pace-setters in the country's catfish farming.
					
					 He had a photo session with them, expressing the expectation and belief that they would add glory to the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il by boosting the production of catfish.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Behests Are Being Successfully Implemented
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Behests Are Being Successfully Implemented
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- This year marks the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He was a peerlessly great man who put the dignity and position of the Korean people on the highest level and laid an eternal foundation for the happiness of the generations to come.
					
					 The Korean people have remained true to his intention and cause over the past three years with ardent yearning and loyalty to him.
					
					 They remodeled the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun as the supreme temple of Juche where he lies in state and erected his statues on Mansu Hill and in various other places of the country. Photos of his beaming image and towers to his immortality are now standing in many places.
					
					 They are holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have bravely overcome difficulties and ordeals with the faith in independence instilled into them by him and protected socialism and dignity of the nation with his pluck and grit.
					
					 The successful launch of satellite "Kwangmyongsong 3-2", an implementation of his last instruction, marked a special event which demonstrated the nation's space science and technology and overall national power and a great victory of the nation, a result of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The successful third underground nuclear test fully demonstrated once again the iron will to devotedly defend the security and sovereignty of the country under the uplifted banner of Songun and displayed its might as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 A high-pitched drive was waged to make a fresh leap forward at all work sites for building a thriving nation and make the seeds of happiness sown by him to yield rich fruits.
					
					 The efforts to apply Kim Jong Il's patriotism to practices resulted in putting the ideological and mental traits of all servicepersons and people on a higher stage and adorning the new century of Juche with a nationwide patriotic advance.
					
					 The era of great changes, era of national prosperity has been ushered in to translate the centuries-old desire and ideal of the Korean people into realities.
					
					 There appeared lots of monumental edifices. They included the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Wisong Scientists Residential Quarters, Yonphung Scientists Rest Home and apartment houses for educators and theaters, hospitals, recreation grounds, riding club, ski resort, kindergarten, children's camp, baby home, orphanage and Tangphung Village for Fishermen. Now under way are the construction of cascade power stations along the River Chongchon and stockbreeding base in Sepho area and the reclamation of tideland.
					
					 Eye-opening achievements have been made in science, education, sports and all other fields for building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 All victories, glory and eternal national prosperity in the DPRK are associated with the immortality of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Patriotic Devotion in Last Year of His Life
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Patriotic Devotion in Last Year of His Life
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il energetically steered the general advance for an upswing to open up a new phase in the building of a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, giving field guidance to a lot of units throughout the country in Juche 100 (2011), the last year of his life. 
					 In January he gave the year's first field guidance to the base for producing glass bottles newly built in Nampho City despite the biting cold in midwinter. Later he provided field guidance to many units including factories in North Phyongan Province, foodstuff factories in Sariwon City and major enterprises in Hamhung City.
					
					 In February he visited a machine factory and in March he gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and Pyongyang Floriculture Institute.
					
					 In April he visited workers in Jagang Province and reposed great trust in them, calling on them to stand in the van of the drive in the age of knowledge-based industry as befitting the creators of the Kanggye spirit. In October he again visited various factories in the province, declaring that the country's machine-building industry reached the level of cutting-edge science and technology.
					
					 He visited factories and enterprises in Hamhung City and was greatly pleased with the start of the production of varieties of vinalon cloth and the creation of fresh wealth that can bring about a turn in building a thriving nation and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 He met workers of the Ryongsong Machine Complex and visited the construction sites for realizing the gasification process at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex several times. He also gave field guidance to the construction site of Tanchon Port, factories and enterprises in Tanchon area and various other units to make sure that a strong wind of the drive for making a leap forward was raised in those units.
					
					 He visited a lot of units including light industry factories, fruit-producing bases in Pyongyang, Ryongjon and Toksong and other areas of the country and even a small production cooperative.
					
					 He gave important instructions for improving the people's living standard by developing the nation's light industry and improving commercial service while looking round the venue of the 2nd commodity exhibition at Pyongyang Department Store No. 1.
					
					 He visited the construction sites in Mansudae area to spruce up Pyongyang as a magnificent city and gave field guidance to the Central Tree Nursery to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 The Mansudae Art Studio, the Central Zoo, the Amusement Park in Kaeson Youth Park, the Kwangbok Area Supermarket and others are associated with his devoted service.
					
					 Upon returning home, he provided field guidance to the construction site of the Huichon Power Station without having time to get relieved of the fatigue pent up during his long foreign trip. It was his forced march made in August despite sweltering weather to meet with dear people in the homeland. 
					
					 As seen above, he paid ceaseless visits to defence posts, construction sites, farms and industrial establishments from January to December, 2011. This was a great march of devoted service unprecedented in history as he underwent indescribable hardships as a revolutionary and a human being.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Moves to Reinforce Cyber Command under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Moves to Reinforce Cyber Command under Fire
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are mulling placing the Cyber Command which had been under the Defense Ministry so far under the Joint Chiefs of Staff and increasing its scope and budget. 
					 The south Korean puppet military claims that this step is aimed to cope with "someone's threat of cyber war" but it is nothing but the last resort aiming at tiding over the crisis into which the south Korean authorities had been driven due to the Cyber Command.
					
					 In the past "presidential election" the Park Geun Hye group conducted red herring operations not only with the Intelligence Service (IS) but with the Defense Ministry involved. 
					
					 Under the supervision of the Defense Ministry the Cyber Command received a huge amount of funds from the IS and hatched plots in an organized manner while paying from hundreds of thousands of won to millions of won to more than 100 agents of the team for psychological warfare according to their classes and positions. 
					
					 In face of strong protest and denunciation for this clumsy farce at home and abroad, the south Korean authorities hastily took the above-said action in a bid to calm down the angry public.

articles.title: Special Unit of U.S. Forces Stages Saber Rattling in S. Korea
articles.content:
Special Unit of U.S. Forces Stages Saber Rattling in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed recently that a special unit of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops staged drills for a war of aggression together with the south Korean puppet army in Seoul and areas around it for two months from September.
					 According to south Korean media, this unit called Ranger specializes in abducting VIPs and striking strategic targets, etc.
					
					 The puppet group is claiming that it has regularly staged drills with special units of the U.S. 3-4 times in a year in a diverse manner.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Hailin City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China on Nov. 26 made public a statement in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK which clarified its principled stand on the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and its followers. 
					 The acts of treachery committed by the south Korean authorities and their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket are little short of spitting in their own faces and they are touching off bitterer wrath and curse only among all Koreans, the statement said, adding:
					
					 We overseas Koreans will surely settle accounts with the U.S. and its followers and the UN that are working hard to turn the inviolable international arena into the illegal theatre for violating a dignified sovereign country and a sinister bargaining place to justify the U.S. high-handed hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 All Korean nationals of the Hailin City branch of the General Association of Koreans in China will mercilessly smash the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the U.S. and its followers to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Young Russians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Young Russians
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Dec. 1.
					 Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 It decided to organize political and cultural events praising the immortal life and exploits of Kim Jong Il in Moscow and local areas from Dec. 1 to 22.

articles.title: Committee for Honoring Memory of Kim Jong Il Formed in Russia
articles.content:
Committee for Honoring Memory of Kim Jong Il Formed in Russia
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the Usurisk City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Dec. 2.
					 Kharitonov, first secretary of the Usurisk City Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in India
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Indian and World Event of India.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a mighty political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly meet the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					 A releasing ceremony of the work took place at the Indian and World Event on December 1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Mexico, Kyrgyzstan and Indonesia in the period between November 22 and 28 on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise. 
					 Present there were personages of various circles and the masses in those countries.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the president and secretary general of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless Songun brilliant commander and elder statesman of the world as he defended the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and turned the DPRK into an invincible fortress of socialism with tremendous military capabilities.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan said that Kim Jong Il made sure that the Workers' Party of Korea boundlessly loved and served the people. He also set forth the benevolent politics as the basic political mode of the Party and saw to it that it was thoroughly embodied.
					
					 The director of the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia noted that Kim Jong Il was the greatest man as he performed great feats on behalf of the times and history, being possessed of extraordinary political caliber and noble personality.
					
					 The director of the Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Co. of Indonesia stressed that Kim Jong Il glorified the history of human thought through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and made socialist Korea demonstrate its might as a political and ideological and military power.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Brazil
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in Brazil
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Brazil on Nov. 17 and 25 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a Korean photo and book exhibition and a film show by Rio Grande Do Sul State Congress, a remembrance meeting and a film show by the teachers' trade union of the Brazilian Workers' Unique Centre. 
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, photos and books introducing the efforts made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles and the masses.
					
					 The speaker of the above-said Congress spoke highly of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by founding and developing the DPRK.
					
					 Raul Kroeff, member of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, said during his visit to the DPRK he saw for himself amazing realities he had not imagined before, adding the Korean people have worked world-startling miracles in all fields of socialist construction under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Acilino Riveiro, chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il made tireless efforts for the prosperity of socialist Korea and happiness of its people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The undying exploits of Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by not only the Korean but also other progressives, he added.

articles.title: Swedish Magazine Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Swedish Magazine Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The 4th issue of the Swedish magazine Korean News carried a special write-up titled "Third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise" illustrated with his photo.
					 It said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a great leader who performed gigantic exploits for protecting the sovereignty of the country, achieving the cause of reunification, building socialism in the DPRK and providing happiness to its people.
					
					 Since he started his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in 1964, he dedicated his all to developing the WPK into an invincible steel-strong party.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March and the forced march when the Korean people faced unprecedented trials and difficulties due to the imperialists' desperate moves to stifle the DPRK and the continued natural disasters following the demise of President Kim Il Sung, he performed historical exploits by holding higher the banner of Songun, thereby protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism, ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and providing the conditions and foundation for building an economic power. 
					
					 He also performed undying exploits for accomplishing the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea by making sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted.
					
					 Thanks to his great devotion and exploits for the country and its people, the Korean people are dynamically stepping up the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: European Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Support for Its South Headquarters
articles.content:
European Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon Calls for Support for Its South Headquarters
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public an appeal on Nov. 20 to mark the 24th anniversary of its formation. 
					 Noting that 24 years have passed since the declaration of its formation promising the Koreans to fulfill its historic mission as an organization for solidarity among Koreans in the north and the south and overseas, the appeal went on:
					
					 The anti-reunification forces in south Korea are, however, resorting to all sorts of plots and suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon at this hour, too. 
					
					 The south Korean sycophantic and traitorous regime is suppressing political parties, organizations and citizens demanding the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration after indiscriminately branding them as "forces following the north" and imposing prison terms upon the leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon on charges of violation of the mediaeval anti-human rights "Security Law." 
					
					 The appeal called upon all Koreans in the north, south and overseas and all the organizations under Pomminryon to extend full support to the struggle of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place at the Kim Jong Il Library in Enugu State, the Ministry of Education and a general hospital in Yobe State, a company in Lagos, a chicken farm in Zamfara State, the Franoson Mannyon International Company Ltd, a Korean medical center and Koryo center in Nigeria from Nov. 10 to 27 to commemorate the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "The Monument to Party Founding", "Arms of Korea" and "Pyongyang Today".
					
					 Present there were personages of different circles and masses.
					
					 The chief of the library said that Kim Jong Il dedicated himself to the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 A director of the ministry of Education in Yobe State noted that Kim Jong Il put military capabilities of the DPRK on the highest level and turned it into a politico-ideological power the people of which have achieved the single-minded unity with his Songun leadership.
					
					 The president of the general hospital in Yobe State said that under the guidance of Kim Jong Il the DPRK could possess reliable war deterrence.
					
					 The director of the company in Lagos praised Kim Jong Il for formulating the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forward by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification, thereby ushering in a new era of independence reunification that advances in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: U.S. Branded as Worst Human Rights Abuser in Germany
articles.content:
U.S. Branded as Worst Human Rights Abuser in Germany
Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public an article branding the U.S. as the worst human rights abuser on Nov. 24.
					 The U.S. noisy trumpeting about the "human rights issue" in the DPRK is, in essence, a grave invasion aimed at bringing down the social system and state, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and western countries are now escalating the human rights abuses while ruthlessly trampling down the political freedom and rights of the peoples of their countries.
					
					 It is the American society in which the people always live in uneasiness and horror under the sway of extreme individualism and misanthropy. 
					
					 The world is torn with disputes, internal disturbances and economic difficulties and the right to existence of the people is being threatened due to the moves of the U.S. and western countries.
					
					 "Human rights issue" is getting evermore serious and complicated owing to the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices and double standards.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the U.S. issues "reports on human rights" in many countries every year and stages farces for adopting an act against a sovereign state.
					
					 The world community is vehemently denouncing the U.S., the worst human rights abuser, for styling itself a "human rights judge," the article concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Siluros 9 de Mayo.
					Dijo que le alegro muchisimo el parte de los comandantes de la unidad del EPC, inspeccionada ayer, de que los militares reciben normalmente los siluros producidos aqui segun el sistema de suministro, establecido por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y los consumen con mucho gusto. Agrego que visito la fabrica para reunirse con los empleados que materializan consecuentemente las instrucciones de legado del Dirigente.
					
					Esta fabrica es un patrimonio patriotico dejado por el Dirigente y la base original de la cria de siluros de nuestro pais, construida durante la Marcha Penosa y la forzada gracias a la direccion de el que tomo la iniciativa de la cria de siluros, fijo el solar de la fabrica e indico las tareas y remedios para cientifizar e intensificar la piscicultura desde el aseguramiento de peces reproductores, recordo.
					
					Propuso construir el monumento a la visita de orientacion para transmitir las hazanas de guia del Dirigente y escogio personalmente el terreno del monumento.
					
					Hizo llamar la fabrica como la de Siluros 9 de Mayo para trabajar bien sin olvidar la fecha de la primera visita del Dirigente.
					
					Recorriendo los edificios de incubacion y siluros y otros lugares, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y de las actividades administrativas de la fabrica.
					
					Instruyendo producir adicionalmente mas de 100 toneladas de siluros desde el proximo ano sin ampliar la mano de obra y el area de produccion, enseno los remedios para ese fin.
					
					Apunto que las experiencias de la fabrica demuestran que se pueden lograr grandes exitos en la cria de peces cuando se realicen la jucheanizacion, la cientifizacion y la  intensificacion.
					
					Ordeno avivar el fervor de la revolucion en la cria a base de la experiencia de esta fabrica para materializar cabalmente las instrucciones dadas por el Dirigente.
					
					Elogio a los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica como exploradores y precursores en la cria de siluros.
					
					Convencido de que ellos glorifiquen siempre las proezas de direccion del Dirigente con la produccion de abundantes peces, se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompano el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang.
